$documentation.purpose: Pipeline configuration specifying the active workflow, version, and paths. Used by orchestrator skills to determine execution context.
$documentation.phase_position: Created at CP0, referenced by all pipeline skills

key_attributes.pipeline_name: Name of the active pipeline (discovery, prototype, productspecs, etc.)
key_attributes.created_at: ISO timestamp when pipeline was initialized
key_attributes.system_name: Name of the system being processed

validation_rules: pipeline_name MUST be one of: discovery, prototype, productspecs, solarch, implementation
skills_path MUST point to valid .claude/skills/ directory
